sections.heading: Understanding Hip Replacement Surgery
sections.content: Hip replacement surgery in India has become a leading choice for international patients seeking high-quality orthopedic care at affordable costs. This procedure involves replacing damaged hip joint components with artificial implants to restore mobility and reduce pain.

sections.heading: Types of Hip Replacement
sections.content: India offers various hip replacement options including total hip replacement, partial hip replacement, and minimally invasive techniques. Each approach is tailored to the patient's specific condition and needs.
